DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study elucidate tolerability effectiveness consumption complex indigestible sugar dairy product call bovine milk oligosaccharide ( BMO ) enrich intestinal microflora toward beneficial population .
DOC.detailed_description: This single-blind crossover study design determine BMO two different dos selectively enrich beneficial bacteria human gut tolerate healthy participant compare placebo control supplement . Each participant consume two sachet supplement eleven day , separate two-week washout start second third arm . To determine effect dose , placebo-control supplement administer first arm , follow low high dose . Participants collect stool first morning urine study personnel collect blood participant baseline ( day 0 ) end ( Day 11 ) study arm three arm .
DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman age 1840 year old BMI 1825 Born vaginal birth ( Csection ) Breastfed minimum 2 month birth Individuals regularly consume high fiber cereal fiber supplement Individuals frequently consume yogurt ( eligible willing refrain consumption study period ) Individuals lactose intolerant and/or allergic dairy wheat Individuals use tobacco product Individuals pregnant lactating Individuals know presence gastrointestinal/malabsorption disorder autoimmune disease Individuals take prescription overthecounter medication include pre/probiotics , corticosteroid , antiobesity agent , laxative , lipid altering medication
